trans-unit.source: Defines the identity permission for strong names.
trans-unit.target: 定義強式名稱的識別權限。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別無法被繼承。

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/add/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], identity permissions are not used.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT]> 起始與[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/add/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]，不會使用身分識別的權限。

trans-unit.source: > > In the .NET Framework versions 1.0 and 1.1, identity permissions cannot have an <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> permission state value.
trans-unit.target: >> 在.NET framework 1.0 和 1.1 版中，身分識別的權限不能有<xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>權限狀態的值。</xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>

trans-unit.source: In the .NET Framework version 2.0 and later, identity permissions can have any permission state value.
trans-unit.target: 在.NET Framework 2.0 或更新版本中，身分識別的權限可以有任何權限狀態的值。

trans-unit.source: This means that in version 2.0 and later versions, identity permissions have the same behavior as permissions that implement the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.IUnrestrictedPermission> interface.
trans-unit.target: 這表示在 2.0 版和更新版本中，身分識別的權限具有相同的行為，做為實作的權限<xref:System.Security.Permissions.IUnrestrictedPermission>介面。</xref:System.Security.Permissions.IUnrestrictedPermission>

trans-unit.source: That is, a demand for an identity always succeeds, regardless of the identity of the assembly, if the assembly has been granted full trust.
trans-unit.target: 也就是身分識別的要求一定會成功，不論的身分識別的組件中，如果組件授與完全信任。

trans-unit.source: Use StrongNameIdentityPermission to confirm that the calling code is in a particular strong-named code assembly.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 StrongNameIdentityPermission，確認呼叫程式碼是在特定的強式名稱程式碼組件中。

trans-unit.source: Full demands for StrongNameIdentityPermission succeed only if all the assemblies in the stack have the correct evidence to satisfy the demand.
trans-unit.target: StrongNameIdentityPermission 為完整的要求成功，只有堆疊中的所有組件具有正確的辨識項，以便滿足要求。

trans-unit.source: Link demands that use the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.StrongNameIdentityPermissionAttribute> attribute succeed only if the immediate caller has the correct evidence.
trans-unit.target: 連結要求使用<xref:System.Security.Permissions.StrongNameIdentityPermissionAttribute>屬性立即呼叫端沒有正確的辨識項時，才會成功。</xref:System.Security.Permissions.StrongNameIdentityPermissionAttribute>

trans-unit.source: A strong name identity is based on a cryptographic public key called a binary large object (BLOB), which is optionally combined with the name and version of a specific assembly.
trans-unit.target: 強式名稱識別為基礎的密碼編譯公開金鑰稱為 「 二進位大型物件 (BLOB)，它會選擇性地結合特定的組件的版本與名稱。

trans-unit.source: The key defines a unique namespace and provides strong verification that the name is genuine, because the definition of the name must be in an assembly that is signed by the corresponding private key.
trans-unit.target: 索引鍵定義唯一的命名空間，並提供此名稱為正版，所以名稱的定義必須由相對應的私密金鑰所簽署的組件中的強式驗證。

trans-unit.source: Note that the validity of the strong name key is not dependent on a trust relationship or on any certificate necessarily being issued for the key.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，強式名稱金鑰的有效性不依存的信任關係，或任何索引鍵一定要發行的憑證。

trans-unit.source: In the .NET Framework versions 1.0 and 1.1, demands on the identity permissions are effective even when the calling assembly is fully trusted.
trans-unit.target: 在.NET framework 1.0 和 1.1 版中，要求的識別權限會生效，即使在呼叫組件是完全受信任。

trans-unit.source: That is, even if the calling assembly has full trust, a demand for an identity permission fails if the assembly does not meet the demanded criteria.
trans-unit.target: 也就是說，即使呼叫組件包含完全信任，如果組件不符合要求的準則就會失敗識別權限的要求。

trans-unit.source: In the .NET Framework version 2.0 and later, demands for identity permissions are ineffective if the calling assembly has full trust.
trans-unit.target: 在.NET Framework 版本 2.0 和更新版本，要求識別權限都是沒有效率，如果呼叫的組件具有完全信任。

trans-unit.source: This ensures consistency for all permissions and eliminates the treatment of identity permissions as a special case.
trans-unit.target: 這可確保所有的權限的一致性，並減少識別權限做為特殊案例的處理方式。

trans-unit.source: For a complete description of strong names, see the <xref:System.Security.Policy.StrongName> reference page.
trans-unit.target: 如需強式名稱的完整說明，請參閱<xref:System.Security.Policy.StrongName>參考頁面。</xref:System.Security.Policy.StrongName>

trans-unit.source: For more information about strong-named assemblies, see [Strong-Named Assemblies](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關強式名稱組件的詳細資訊，請參閱[強式名稱組件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The StrongNameIdentityPermission class is used to define strong-name requirements for accessing the public members of a type.
trans-unit.target: StrongNameIdentityPermission 類別用來定義用於存取型別的公用成員的強式名稱需求。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Permissions.StrongNameIdentityPermissionAttribute> attribute can be used to define strong-name requirements at the assembly level.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Permissions.StrongNameIdentityPermissionAttribute>屬性可以用來定義強式名稱組件層級的需求。</xref:System.Security.Permissions.StrongNameIdentityPermissionAttribute>

trans-unit.source: In the .NET Framework version 2.0 and later, you can also use the <xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.InternalsVisibleToAttribute> attribute to specify that all nonpublic types in that assembly are visible to another assembly.
trans-unit.target: 在.NET Framework 2.0 或更新版本中，您也可以使用<xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.InternalsVisibleToAttribute>屬性來指定該組件中的所有非公用類型的另一個組件中可見。</xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.InternalsVisibleToAttribute>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Friend Assemblies](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[Friend 組件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.StrongNameIdentityPermission"></xref> class with the specified <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Security.Permissions.StrongNameIdentityPermission"></xref>類別具有指定<xref href="System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Creates either a fully restricted (`None`) or `Unrestricted` permission.
trans-unit.target: 會建立完全限制 (`None`) 或`Unrestricted`權限。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > In the .NET Framework versions 1.0 and 1.1, identity permissions cannot have an <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> permission state value.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 識別權限不能有 in the.NET Framework 1.0 和 1.1 版，<xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>權限狀態的值。</xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>

trans-unit.source: In the .NET Framework version 2.0 and later, identity permissions can have any permission state value.
trans-unit.target: 在.NET Framework 2.0 或更新版本中，身分識別的權限可以有任何權限狀態的值。

trans-unit.source: This means that in version 2.0 and later versions, identity permissions have the same behavior as permissions that implement the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.IUnrestrictedPermission> interface.
trans-unit.target: 這表示在 2.0 版和更新版本中，身分識別的權限具有相同的行為，做為實作的權限<xref:System.Security.Permissions.IUnrestrictedPermission>介面。</xref:System.Security.Permissions.IUnrestrictedPermission>

trans-unit.source: That is, a demand for an identity always succeeds, regardless of the identity of the assembly, if the assembly has been granted full trust.
trans-unit.target: 也就是身分識別的要求一定會成功，不論的身分識別的組件中，如果組件授與完全信任。

trans-unit.source: In the .NET Framework versions 1.0 and 1.1, demands on the identity permissions are effective, even when the calling assembly is fully trusted.
trans-unit.target: 在.NET framework 1.0 和 1.1 版中，身分識別權限的要求是有效的即使是完全受信任的呼叫組件。

trans-unit.source: That is, although the calling assembly has full trust, a demand for an identity permission fails if the assembly does not meet the demanded criteria.
trans-unit.target: 也就是說，雖然呼叫組件具有完全信任，但識別權限的要求會失敗組件不符合要求的準則。

trans-unit.source: In the .NET Framework version 2.0 and later, demands for identity permissions are ineffective if the calling assembly has full trust.
trans-unit.target: 在.NET Framework 版本 2.0 和更新版本，要求識別權限都是沒有效率，如果呼叫的組件具有完全信任。

trans-unit.source: This assures consistency for all permissions, eliminating the treatment of identity permissions as a special case.
trans-unit.target: 如此可確保所有的權限，不會識別權限的特殊情況的一致性。

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor with a permission state value of <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> to create an identity permission that matches no strong names.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個建構函式的權限狀態值<xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>建立比對沒有強式名稱識別權限。</xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>

trans-unit.source: If you subsequently set the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.StrongNameIdentityPermission.Name%2A> and <xref:System.Security.Permissions.StrongNameIdentityPermission.Version%2A> properties, a specific strong name identity can be represented by the permission.
trans-unit.target: 如果您後續將<xref:System.Security.Permissions.StrongNameIdentityPermission.Name%2A>和<xref:System.Security.Permissions.StrongNameIdentityPermission.Version%2A>屬性、 特定的強式名稱身分識別可以由權限。</xref:System.Security.Permissions.StrongNameIdentityPermission.Version%2A> </xref:System.Security.Permissions.StrongNameIdentityPermission.Name%2A>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個<xref href="System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: The state parameter is not a valid value of .
trans-unit.target: state 參數不是有效的值 。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.StrongNameIdentityPermission"></xref> class for the specified strong name identity.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Security.Permissions.StrongNameIdentityPermission"></xref>指定強式名稱身分識別的類別。

trans-unit.source: The `name` and `version` parameters can be `null` only when the public key is used to identify the assembly.
trans-unit.target: `name`和`version`參數可以是`null`只當公開金鑰用來識別組件。

trans-unit.source: An empty string ("") should not be used in place of `null`.
trans-unit.target: 空字串 ("") 不應取代`null`。

trans-unit.source: If `name` is an empty string, an <xref:System.ArgumentException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果`name`為空字串，<xref:System.ArgumentException>就會擲回。</xref:System.ArgumentException>

trans-unit.source: For more information on names and version numbers of assemblies, see [Strong-Named Assemblies](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關名稱和版本號碼的組件的詳細資訊，請參閱[強式名稱組件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The public key defining the strong name identity namespace.
trans-unit.target: 定義強式名稱識別命名空間的公開金鑰。

trans-unit.source: The simple name part of the strong name identity.
trans-unit.target: 強式名稱識別的簡單名稱部分。

trans-unit.source: This corresponds to the name of the assembly.
trans-unit.target: 這會對應至組件名稱。

trans-unit.source: The version number of the identity.
trans-unit.target: 身分識別的版本號碼。

trans-unit.source: The blob parameter is .
trans-unit.target: The blob parameter is .

trans-unit.source: The name parameter is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: name 參數為空字串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns an identical copy of the current permission.
trans-unit.target: 建立並傳回目前權限的相同複本。

trans-unit.source: A copy of a permission represents the same access to resources as the original permission.
trans-unit.target: 一份權限表示與原始的權限資源相同的存取權。

trans-unit.source: A copy of the current permission.
trans-unit.target: 一份目前的權限。

trans-unit.source: Reconstructs a permission with a specified state from an XML encoding.
trans-unit.target: 重新建構具有指定狀態的 XML 編碼方式的權限。

trans-unit.source: This method is not used by application code.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法不是由應用程式程式碼。

trans-unit.source: The XML encoding to use to reconstruct the permission.
trans-unit.target: XML 編碼用來重新建構權限。

trans-unit.source: The e parameter is .
trans-unit.target: The e parameter is .

trans-unit.source: The e parameter is not a valid permission element.
trans-unit.target: e 參數不是有效的權限項目。

trans-unit.source: -or- The e parameter's version number is not valid.
trans-unit.target: -或- e 參數的版本號碼不正確。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns a permission that is the intersection of the current permission and the specified permission.
trans-unit.target: 建立並傳回目前權限和指定的權限交集的權限。

trans-unit.source: The intersection of two permissions is a permission that describes the set of operations they both describe in common.
trans-unit.target: 兩個權限的交集會描述一組共同兩者描述的作業的權限。

trans-unit.source: Only a demand that passes both original permissions will pass the intersection.
trans-unit.target: 只有通過這兩個原始的使用權限的需求會通過交集。

trans-unit.source: The intersection of two identical strong name identity permissions is the same permission.
trans-unit.target: 兩個相同的強式名稱身分識別的權限的交集是相同的權限。

trans-unit.source: The intersection of two different (not wildcard) expressions is an empty permission.
trans-unit.target: 交集的兩個不同 （沒有萬用字元） 的運算式是空的權限。

trans-unit.source: The intersection of a wildcard expression and a matching strong name is the strong name.
trans-unit.target: 交集的萬用字元運算式和比對的強式名稱是強式名稱。

trans-unit.source: The intersection of two wildcard expressions that match is the longer, more specific of the two expressions.
trans-unit.target: 比對的兩個萬用字元運算式的交集是較長，更具體的兩個運算式。

trans-unit.source: A permission to intersect with the current permission.
trans-unit.target: 要與目前權限產生交集的權限。

trans-unit.source: It must be of the same type as the current permission.
trans-unit.target: 它必須是類型的相同與目前權限。

trans-unit.source: A new permission that represents the intersection of the current permission and the specified permission, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the intersection is empty.
trans-unit.target: 代表目前權限與所指定的權限交集的新權限或<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>如果交集是空的。

trans-unit.source: The target parameter is not and is not of the same type as the current permission.
trans-unit.target: target 參數不是而且不屬於相同的類型與目前權限。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the current permission is a subset of the specified permission.
trans-unit.target: 判斷目前權限是否為指定的權限的子集。

trans-unit.source: The current permission is a subset of the specified permission if the current permission specifies a set of operations that is wholly contained by the specified permission.
trans-unit.target: 如果目前權限會指定一組完全包含所指定的權限的作業，目前的權限會是所指定權限的子集。

trans-unit.source: For example, the other properties being equal, an identity with the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.StrongNameIdentityPermission.Name%2A> property containing the wildcard expression MyCompany.MyDepartment.* is identified as a subset of an identity with the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.StrongNameIdentityPermission.Name%2A> property MyCompany.MyDepartment.MyFile.
trans-unit.target: 例如，相等的其他屬性，與身分識別<xref:System.Security.Permissions.StrongNameIdentityPermission.Name%2A>內含的萬用字元運算式 MyCompany.MyDepartment.* 屬性識別為與身分識別的子集<xref:System.Security.Permissions.StrongNameIdentityPermission.Name%2A>屬性 MyCompany.MyDepartment.MyFile。</xref:System.Security.Permissions.StrongNameIdentityPermission.Name%2A> </xref:System.Security.Permissions.StrongNameIdentityPermission.Name%2A>

trans-unit.source: A permission that is to be tested for the subset relationship.
trans-unit.target: 要測試子集關聯性的權限。

trans-unit.source: This permission must be of the same type as the current permission.
trans-unit.target: 此權限必須是類型的相同與目前權限。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the current permission is a subset of the specified permission; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果目前權限是指定的權限的子集否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The target parameter is not and is not of the same type as the current permission.
trans-unit.target: target 參數不是而且不屬於相同的類型與目前權限。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the simple name portion of the strong name identity.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定強式名稱識別的簡單名稱部分。

trans-unit.source: The value of the Name property can be an exact name or can be modified by a wildcard character in the final position; for example, both MyCompany.MyDepartment.MyFile and MyCompany.MyDepartment.* are valid names.
trans-unit.target: 名稱屬性的值可以是完全相同的名稱，或可以修改在最後的位置; 萬用字元例如，MyCompany.MyDepartment.MyFile 和 MyCompany.MyDepartment.* 是有效的名稱。

trans-unit.source: If you attempt to set the Name property to an empty string (""), an <xref:System.ArgumentException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果您嘗試將名稱屬性設定為空字串 ("")、<xref:System.ArgumentException>就會擲回。</xref:System.ArgumentException>

trans-unit.source: The simple name of the identity.
trans-unit.target: 身分識別的簡單名稱。

trans-unit.source: The value is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 值為空字串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: The property value cannot be retrieved because it contains an ambiguous identity.
trans-unit.target: 無法擷取屬性值，因為它包含模稜兩可的身分識別。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the public key blob that defines the strong name identity namespace.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定定義強式名稱識別命名空間的公開金鑰 blob。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.StrongNamePublicKeyBlob"></xref> that contains the public key of the identity, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if there is no key.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.StrongNamePublicKeyBlob"> </xref> ，其中包含身分識別的公開金鑰或<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>如果沒有任何索引鍵。

trans-unit.source: The property value is set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 屬性值設定為<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The property value cannot be retrieved because it contains an ambiguous identity.
trans-unit.target: 無法擷取屬性值，因為它包含模稜兩可的身分識別。

trans-unit.source: Creates an XML encoding of the permission and its current state.
trans-unit.target: 建立權限和其目前狀態的 XML 編碼方式。

trans-unit.source: This method is not typically used by application code.
trans-unit.target: 應用程式程式碼通常不使用這個方法。

trans-unit.source: An XML encoding of the permission, including any state information.
trans-unit.target: 權限，包括任何狀態資訊的 XML 編碼方式。

trans-unit.source: Creates a permission that is the union of the current permission and the specified permission.
trans-unit.target: 建立權限聯集的目前的權限與指定權限。

trans-unit.source: The result of a call to Union is a permission that represents all the operations represented by both the current permission and the specified permission.
trans-unit.target: 要聯集呼叫的結果是權限，表示代表的所有作業目前的權限和指定的權限。

trans-unit.source: Any demand that passes either permission passes their union.
trans-unit.target: 傳遞其中一個權限的任何要求會傳遞它們的聯集。

trans-unit.source: The union of a permission and `null` is the permission that is not `null`.
trans-unit.target: 權限的聯集和`null`是不是使用權限`null`。

trans-unit.source: The union of a permission and a subset of that permission is the permission that contains the other.
trans-unit.target: 權限的聯集和該權限的子集是包含其他的權限。

trans-unit.source: Any other combination results in an <xref:System.ArgumentException> exception being thrown.
trans-unit.target: 任何其他組合會產生<xref:System.ArgumentException>擲回例外狀況。</xref:System.ArgumentException>

trans-unit.source: A permission to combine with the current permission.
trans-unit.target: 與目前權限結合的權限。

trans-unit.source: It must be of the same type as the current permission.
trans-unit.target: 它必須是類型的相同與目前權限。

trans-unit.source: A new permission that represents the union of the current permission and the specified permission.
trans-unit.target: 新的權限，表示目前的權限與指定權限的聯集。

trans-unit.source: The target parameter is not and is not of the same type as the current permission.
trans-unit.target: target 參數不是而且不屬於相同的類型與目前權限。

trans-unit.source: -or- The two permissions are not equal and one is a subset of the other.
trans-unit.target: -或-兩個權限不相等，且其中一個其他的子集。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the version number of the identity.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定身分識別的版本號碼。

trans-unit.source: The version of the identity.
trans-unit.target: 識別的版本。

trans-unit.source: The property value cannot be retrieved because it contains an ambiguous identity.
trans-unit.target: 無法擷取屬性值，因為它包含模稜兩可的身分識別。
